name: Trade Wars
description:
Trade war was made as a political satire between the USA and China but is now deemed irrelevant due to the current political change happening in the USA. It was made as a simple re-skin (rip off) of the original Donkey Kong.

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
